snippet.title: Destino Indomable - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
#steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3221830?utm_source=trailer
#playstation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013475
#nintendoswitch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/destino-indomable-switch/
#xbox coming on March 13th

In Destino Indomable, you're the hot new actress tasked with playing the main character in a telenovela! This is a wild visual novel inspired by the craziest Latin soup operas, filled with humor, drama, romance, horses, handsome men, Spanglish and slaps!

Features:
- Telenovela themed visual novel: We're bringing all the magic and surreal elements from Latin telenovelas to the VN Genre!
- Character popularity system: Depending on your actions, some characters may see more screen time. The more a character appears, the more the audience will love them!
- Create the perfect lead actress: Play with your clothes, hairstyle, colors, accessories, body types and more!
- Five romance paths: What's a good telenovela without some romance? Each character offers a plotline to discover. You'll learn a different piece of the mystery by seeing each of them!
- Different endings: Your choices through the telenovela will shape the story, culminating in more than 5 vastly different endings. Heroes become villains, villains become heroes, people return from the death... it's a telenovela, anything goes!

Over 15 hours of story: This game is very vast and filled with little details to uncover. You may find a secret or two that you wouldn't in a different playthrough.

More Information:
www.jandusoft.com/destinoindomable
